  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DisconnectedViewController
    The DisconnectedViewController class manages the state of the application when the client is disconnected.
    LobbyBoxController
    The LobbyBoxController class is responsible for controlling the lobby box view in the GUI.
    LobbyViewController
    The LobbyViewController class manages the lobby view in the GUI.
    NetworkViewController
    The NetworkViewController class manages the network view in the GUI.
    PlayerBoxController
    The PlayerBoxController class manages the player box view in the GUI.
    PlayerViewController
    Controller class for managing the player's view in the game GUI.
    SelectStarterController
    Controller class for handling the selection of starter card and objective cards in the GUI.
    UsernameViewController
    Controller class for handling username input and lobby actions in the GUI.
    WelcomeViewController
    Controller class for handling the welcome view and lobby selection in the GUI.
    WinnerViewController
    Controller class for displaying the game's winner and ranking information in the GUI.
